name: Sky & Islands
description:
Sky & Islands

The sky gets ripped apart and you need to fix it. Now you're no engineer, you can't build planes or spaceships. What you can do however is build buildings. Get all the way up to the sky and stitch it up.

Info

Buildings:

  • Land - Let's you place buildings on, costs 100
  • House - Gives you 15% income boost, costs 500
  • Windblower - Shields you from storms
  • Port - Gives you 4000 cash per minute, costs 4000, doesn't require island
  • Bank - Gives you 3200 cash per minute, costs 2000
  • Farm - Gives you 2400 cash per minute, costs 1000
  • Windmill - Gives you 1600 cash per minute, costs 500
  • Elevator - Let's you move up or down

All buildings need to be placed on land, except for port.

Storm spawns every 40 seconds, attacks either of your buildings or a windblower

To go to next level click on an elevator while having nothing selected, and choose Go Up or Go Down.

You can also demolish buildings by clicking on them and choosing Demolish.
